alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bradford, northeastern Alachua, west central Putnam and south central Union Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 756 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sampson to near Palatka. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Melrose, Beasley, New River, Melrose Landing, Orange Heights, Hollister, Sampson and Waldo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam
